scripts.build-rename: npm run build-rename-js && npm run build-rename-css && npm run build-copy-files && npm run build-del-excess-files
scripts.build-del-old-files: del /Q web\css\* & del /Q web\js\* & del /Q web\media\*
scripts.build-rename-js: rr build\static\js\*.js "main.*?chunk.js" "main.chunk.js" && rr build\static\js\*.js ".*?chunk.js" "chunk.js" && rr build\static\js\*.js "main.*?.js" "main.js" && rr build\static\js\*.js "runtime-main.*?.js" "runtime-main.js"
scripts.build-del-excess-files: del web\css\*.map  & del web\js\*.map  & del web\js\*.txt
